channel.description: Recent content in woodwork on tiago.dev

item.title: My first table!
item.description: Why did I build a table? My work desk was bending after about 1 year of working from home. My office equipment is actually pretty heavy. So I decided to build a table! Why not just buy one? I like building things. and some youtube videos claimed I could make one for under $100. and the biggest reasons were that if I build one: would be fun! I would learn a new skill!
